title: Richmond National Battlefield Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Schedule for Richmond National Battlefield Park Park battlefield areas are open sunrise to sunset. The park is closed on the following days: Thanksgiving, December 25, and January 1. Visitor Center Hours: Tredegar Visitor Center: Open daily 9:00am to 5:00pm Exhibits, two short films.  Chimborazo Medical Museum: Open daily 9:00am to 4:30pm Surgical and medical displays, 17 minute film.  Cold Harbor Visitor Center: Open daily 9:00am to 4:30pm Walking trail, electric map programs.  Fort Harrison Visitor Center: Open early June- early August, Wednesday-Sunday, 9:00am to 4:30pm  Glendale/Malvern Hill Visitor Center: Open early June-early August, Wednesday-Sunday, 9:00am to 4:30pm  Shelton House at Rural Plains: Open afternoons on Saturday and Sunday from April through October, 1:00pm to 4:00pm
